@CDCgov This has passed from an outbreak, a sudden occurrence & increase in a disease in a specific time & place, to at least 4 countries. 4 linked cases can comprise an outbreak.This is an EPIDEMIC that has reached more than 4 countries as it is rapidly spreading to a large number.
